directions: Mix flour, paprika, and garlic together in a shallow bowl. Coat chicken thoroughly with flour mixture.
Heat oil in a deep skillet over medium heat. Cook chicken in hot oil until golden brown and no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes per side.
Layer chicken, tomato, and lettuce on whole wheat buns.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed
title: EZ Fried Chicken Sandwich
